name: Sacred (itch)
description:
Sacred is a simultaneous turn-based single-player game.

You have to use the 5 types of characters to protect the Holy Grail. Evey character has his own skill which damages the enemies who come to get the Grail.

This is and endless game. Try to survive the most you can.

If you have any issue to preview the game download the desktop version.

You just need to execute the .exe file
